wikipedia_page.main:
Kevin Jones (born 9 September 1986) is a former English professional cricketer. Jones made one first-class cricket appearance for Kent County Cricket Club in 2005. He was born in Gillingham, Kent in 1986.
Jones was a member of the Cricket Academy at Kent and represented the county at youth level. He first played for Kent's Second XI in 2003 before making his only senior appearance in August 2005 against the touring Bangladesh A team.Jones went on to play for Kent's Second XI and MCC Young Cricketers in the Second XI Championship and Second XI Trophy until the end of the 2007 season, making 30 appearances in the Championship and 19 in the Trophy. He played for Gore Court in Sittingbourne in the Kent Cricket League until 2014.
